testcase.name: ossec::client should contain concat::setup
ossec::client should contain ossec::service
ossec::client should contain ossec::service with install_type set to client
ossec::client should contain ossec::config::client
ossec::client should contain the package ossec
ossec::client should set client_keys
ossec::client should set the key on the client
ossec::config::agentless should contain a concat::fragment for setting the agentless options
ossec::config::agentless install_type set to client should complain if $ossec::config::install_type is set to client
ossec::config::alerts should contain a concat::fragment for setting the alerts options
ossec::config::alerts install_type set to client should complain if $ossec::config::install_type is set to client
ossec::config::alerts email alert level not set properly should complain about email alert level being set incorrectly
ossec::config::alerts log alert level not set properly should complain about log alert level being set incorrectly
ossec::config::client should contain a concat::fragment for setting the client options
ossec::config::client install_type set to server should complain if $ossec::config::install_type is set to server
ossec::config::client either server_ip or server_hostname must be defined should complain if the server_ip and the server hostname are missing
ossec::config::database should contain a concat::fragment for setting the database options
ossec::config::database install_type set to client should complain if $ossec::config::install_type is set to client
ossec::config::database DB type not set properly should complain about DB type being set incorrectly
ossec::config::global should contain a concat::fragment for setting the global options
ossec::config::global install_type set to client should complain if $ossec::config::install_type is set to client
ossec::config::remote should contain a concat::fragment for setting the agentless options
ossec::config::remote install_type set to client should complain if $ossec::config::install_type is set to client
ossec::config::reports should contain a concat::fragment for setting the agentless options
ossec::config::reports install_type set to client should complain if $ossec::config::install_type is set to client
ossec::config::rootcheck should contain a concat::fragment for setting the agentless options
ossec::config::syscheck should contain a concat::fragment for setting the syscheck options
ossec::config::syscheck scan day not set properly should complain about scan day being set incorrectly
ossec::config::syslog should contain a concat::fragment for setting the syslog options
ossec::config::syslog install_type set to client should complain if $ossec::config::install_type is set to client
ossec::config::syslog format not set properly should complain about format being set incorrectly
ossec::config::syslog level not set properly should complain about level being set incorrectly
ossec::config should contain concat::setup
ossec::config should contain a yumrepo for the atomic repo
ossec::config should manage a file resource for the atomic gpg key
ossec::config should contain an exec to import the gpg key
ossec::config should contain a concat to manage the configuration file
ossec::config should contain a concat fragment for adding the ossec config file header
ossec::config should contain a concat fragment for adding the ossec config file footer
ossec::config install type not set properly should complain if $ossec::config::install_type is not set to client or server
ossec::config install type set to server should contain a concat::fragment for the rules beginning
ossec::config install type set to server should contain a concat::fragment for the rules end
ossec::server should contain concat::setup
ossec::server should contain ossec::service
ossec::server should contain ossec::config with install_type set to server
ossec::server should contain ossec::config::remote
ossec::server should contain ossec::config::global
ossec::server should have the ossec server package installed
ossec::server should manage the plist_file
ossec::server should contain a concat for managing the client keys
ossec::service should include the class ossec::params
ossec::service should define the ossec service
ossec::clientkey should include the params class
ossec::clientkey should define a client key resource that appends to an existing file
ossec::clientkey missing client_seed should fail if the client_seed parameter is not set
ossec::config::activeres should contain a concat::fragment for setting the activeres options
ossec::config::activeres install_type set to client should complain if $ossec::config::install_type is set to client
ossec::config::activeres location not set properly should complain about location being set incorrectly
ossec::config::command should contain a concat::fragment for setting the activeres options
ossec::config::command timeout_allowed not set properly should complain about timeout_allowed being set incorrectly
ossec::config::email should contain a concat::fragment for setting the email options
ossec::config::email install_type set to client should complain if $ossec::config::install_type is set to client
ossec::config::email if format exists it should be set to full or sms should complain about format being set incorrectly
ossec::config::localfile should contain a concat::fragment for setting the activeres options
ossec::config::localfile log_format not set properly should complain about log_format being set incorrectly
ossec::config::rules should contain a concat::fragment for setting the rules
ossec::config::rules name set to rules_config.xml should not allow you to add rules_config.xml as that is added by default
ossec::config::rules install_type set to client should complain if $ossec::config::install_type is set to client
ossec::config::syscheck::dir should contain a concat::fragment for setting the syscheck dir options
ossec::config::syscheck::ignore should contain a concat::fragment for setting the syscheck ignore options
